org.youscope.plugin.customjob

Interface CustomJob

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, EditableJobContainer, Job, JobContainer, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface CustomJob
extends Job, EditableJobContainer
    A job consisting of other jobs, which can be configured by the user. The single jobs will be run after each other in the order they are created. It is guaranteed that in between two jobs no other tasks are executed by the microscope.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.youscope.common.job.Job

        addJobListener, executeJob, initializeJob, removeJobListener, uninitializeJob

      • Methods inherited from interface org.youscope.common.Component

        addMessageListener, getName, getPositionInformation, getUUID, removeMessageListener, setName

      • Methods inherited from interface org.youscope.common.job.EditableJobContainer

        addJob, clearJobs, insertJob, removeJob

      • Methods inherited from interface org.youscope.common.job.JobContainer

        getJob, getJobs, getNumJobs
